sentences: Ta on muutunud palju viimase aasta jooksul.
Meie suhted olid muutunud p√§rast selle intsidenti.
context: The word 'muutunud' is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'muutuma', meaning 'to change'. It describes something that has undergone a transformation or alteration from its previous state. This can refer to physical changes, personality changes, weather changes, or any kind of modification over time. The word is in the nominative case and indicates a completed action of changing.
